price: 107. foocitte как Qaddowteh ifte marah tu-gactek, Toysa usun Yallih Racmatih (jannat kinnuk) Addal yanin usun kaal waarak.
arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ٱبۡيَضَّتۡ وُجُوهُهُمۡ فَفِي رَحۡمَةِ ٱللَّهِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā alladhīna ib'yaḍḍat wujūhuhum fafī raḥmati al-lahi hum fīhā khālidūna
